briefdescription.para: Function for freeing all allocated channels and groups.
Function for allocating a DPPI channel.

detaileddescription.para: This function allocates the first unused DPPI channel.

simplesect.para: Function is thread safe as it uses nrfx_flag32_alloc.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the DPPI channel number that has been allocated.
The channel was successfully allocated.
There is no available channel to be used.

briefdescription.para: Function for freeing a DPPI channel.

detaileddescription.para: This function also disables the chosen channel. Configuration in PUBLISH/SUBSCRIBE registers used for the channel is not cleared.

simplesect.para: Function is thread safe as it uses nrfx_flag32_free.

parameterdescription.para: DPPI channel to be freed.
The channel was successfully freed.
The specified channel is not allocated.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling a DPPI channel.

parameterdescription.para: DPPI channel to be enabled.
The channel was successfully enabled.
The specified channel is not allocated.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling a DPPI channel.

simplesect.para: Disabling channel does not modify PUBLISH/SUBSCRIBE registers configured to use that channel.

parameterdescription.para: DPPI channel to be disabled.
The channel was successfully disabled.
The specified channel is not allocated.

briefdescription.para: Function for allocating a DPPI channel group.

detaileddescription.para: This function allocates the first unused DPPI group.

simplesect.para: Function is thread safe as it uses nrfx_flag32_alloc.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the DPPI channel group that has been allocated.
The channel group was successfully allocated.
There is no available channel group to be used.

briefdescription.para: Function for freeing a DPPI channel group.

detaileddescription.para: This function also disables the chosen group.

simplesect.para: Function is thread safe as it uses nrfx_flag32_free.

parameterdescription.para: DPPI channel group to be freed.
The channel group was successfully freed.
The specified group is not allocated.

briefdescription.para: Function for including a DPPI channel in a channel group.

parameterdescription.para: DPPI channel to be added.
Channel group in which to include the channel.

simplesect.para: Channel group configuration can be modified only if subscriptions for tasks associated with this group are disabled.

parameterdescription.para: The channel was successfully included.
The specified group or channel is not allocated.

briefdescription.para: Function for removing a DPPI channel from a channel group.

parameterdescription.para: DPPI channel to be removed.
Channel group from which to remove the channel.

simplesect.para: Channel group configuration can be modified only if subscriptions for tasks associated with this group are disabled.

parameterdescription.para: The channel was successfully removed.
The specified group or channel is not allocated.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing a DPPI channel group.

parameterdescription.para: Channel group to be cleared.

simplesect.para: Channel group configuration can be modified only if subscriptions for tasks associated with this group are disabled.

parameterdescription.para: The group was successfully cleared.
The specified group is not allocated.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling a DPPI channel group.

parameterdescription.para: Channel group to be enabled.
The group was successfully enabled.
The specified group is not allocated.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling a DPPI channel group.

parameterdescription.para: Channel group to be disabled.
The group was successfully disabled.
The specified group is not allocated.
